exp1: At Equitable Bank over the summer, I was designing and configuring new platform components and prototyping new technology tools across Azure. I used Elastic Search to analyze server traffic and handle millions of use cases.
exp2: At CIRID, my main responsibility was to lead a team of developers and designers to build a search engine that indexed over 400K articles. As such, I had to ensure a seamless transition from legacy code to our new framework.
